tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
So I was very anxious before visiting a dentist as this was the second time I was going to one in my entire life. Finally decided to visit Dr Pooja after a friend's recommendation. Starting with the way she spoke on the call ( very friendly) to accomodating me amidst all her appointments because I was in pain. She even made me completely stress free about the covid situation as she ensured that the clinic is not cramped up. She guided me to the clinic very patiently even though it's pretty easy to locate. Then comes the real part. She put me at complete ease explained me the situation so well and made me aware of why it's important to do certain things right in a root canal treatment. She convinced me to start with the procedure because the situation was bad and immediate attention needs to be given. First she put me at complete ease and ensured that nothing will go further if I am uncomfortable or in pain. Then she started with the real magic. She patiently did the procedure ensuring at no given point I was in pain, if I was then she immediately stopped and made sure I am not. I cannot believe I am saying this but I cannot wait to go back to her and complete my treatment. She was like a family member and looked after me just like my elder sister. She is a very warm and honest medical practitioner. I can only say that I have gained my dentist for life and I am at complete ease if at all I need any attention for my oral hygiene. Thank you Dr Pooja for converting a complete anti dental person to someone who wants to ensure that regular visits will be done. Thank you for everything. Thank you for making this procedure completely painless and easy.
Anyone reading this, don't even think once before visiting Dr Pooja because she is indeed the best dentist in town
reply_text: Thank you so much for such a detailed feedback it surely makes me and our team very happy . We look forward to seeing you and to your recommendations and referrals in future .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had visited the Dental Lounge on account of tooth pain and concurrent twitch on the right side. Dr. Pooja Desai was very adept at identifying the issue and recommending the right solution. I, subsequently, underwent a wisdom tooth extraction at the Dental Lounge. My experience was absolutely flawless. I was very nervous owing to my previous dental experiences at other places, however, she was very patient and walked me through the steps one by one, and I ended up having the smoothest procedure. She has a very professional team and a strong network! Definitely recommend visiting her for any dental ailment!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got my 4 of my teeth extracted yesterday and the overall experience was superb. Initially I was nervous, but Doctor Pooja is a professional who made me feel at ease. They have every necessary equipment available with them, and the best part was that within no time, the procedure was done. I would highly recommend getting an appointment with Dr Pooja if you’re facing dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First of all Pooja is not just a dentist a friendly guide. My wife Afshan had undertaken treatment with Pooja few years back and she was mightily impressed.
We stay abroad Afshan has undergone dental examination with dentists in Ireland and Uk. 
**** *** ******* ****** ********* ** **** *** ***** ***** *** ** *** **** ******** ** ********** ** ******* One of her key concerns been dentists try to focus on everything but not the real problem.

Few traits that make our visit to Dr. Pooja satisfying-
1) Effective time management for instance she’s getting Afshan’s crown fixing in less than couple of days whilst dentists elsewhere said weeks time will be a dream.
2) Friendly environment the dental clinic is spic and shine gives a corporate feel than a hospital feel
3) Explains the root cause, issue in a simplistic tone
4) Always wear gear with a smile 
5) Very professional and ensures well being for instance checks whether the long sitting made Afshan fatigue.

Lastly Dr. Pooja Desai believes in giving her best and always open to seek feedback to improve. 
As they say perfection leads to excellence

Kudos to Pooja and her nice staff.

Regards
Afshan & Zaki 
Dublin, Ireland
reply_text: Thank you for a wonderful feedback we look forward to your recommendations

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Both the doctor who extracted my tooth and Dr Pooja were making sure I was comfortable during the entire procedure and that helped me stay calm.

tags: Value for money,
review: Last month I gave good reviews to Dr. Pooja Desai just after my 2nd visit which now I think I should not have... though her service is good please discuss the cost of treatment very clearly with her before you start the treatment I was misguided n charged exorbitant  I was not told what all was included n what not before starting the treatment . Inspite of not creating a scene there n clearing the full payment on time I was told m rude n accusing them. I told them that they shouldve told me before on that they said they did .They offered me the money back but I didnt take as I dont take favours. I would suggest ask them about the full cost of the treatment in advance take it in writing so that they dont ask you money which they don't tell you before.
reply_text: Hello ma’am sorry to have not met your expectations . Firstly we have cleared this verbally as well as personally but just because you decide to put it here we wish to clear that everything was pre mentioned which we have a record of as no treatments are forced upon any patients . Also no objections were raised when a complimentary clean up was offered even before you had issues with us , but the moment you are charged for a treatment that you were pre informed of and you decided to go ahead with it ( no pressure or force from our end ) here comes the negative feedback . As we take all our feedbacks positively , like always we will surely work on our short comings . Thank you for your valuable time & your feedback . Hope you have a great day ahead  . Dr. Pooja D Desai .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: *** ***** ** ** *** *** **** ******* * **** **** ** **** * **** **** ** **** ******** *** ** ***** **** ***** my first visit to the dental lounge in 2011 I have never gone to another dentist and will not go to another because Dr. Pooja is soo good.  She will patiently explain the problem until you are satisfied and she will also give you options on how to save your tooth. The best part is that the fetal lounge regularly follows up for periodic  check ups I'm case you forget to check your teeth once every six months.
reply_text: Thank you so so much for your kind words it truly makes our team work even harder . We look forward to your recommendations . Have a great day ahead . Warm regards : Dr. Pooja D Desai .

tags: Value for money,
review:
Today my experience was such where the charges are just not pocket friendly.3500/- just for a filling is way too expensive.During these tuff times I guess doctors are the ones who are just not being considerate and doubling their charges.
I will think twice before booking an appointment.
reply_text: Sorry to have disappointed and not met to your expectations sir . The charges have been mentioned on your treatment records since your last visit in May 2019 which may be have skipped out of your memory . Considering covid we have not increased charges for any treatments which we can share a proof record of from your last visit in May 2019 . A small tip for everyone reading this “ Dentistry is not expensive neglect is “ . We would still be happy to help you in future if need based . Stay safe stay healthy .
